35.text:
Allegedly, moot broke it when he tried to ban some spammer from /a/.

Anyways, temporary fix: Grab [ref control](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/refcontrol/) for firefox. [input settings](https://imgur.com/qSk2I).  Double check, make sure it's https. Enjoy QR.

If it doesn't work, put `moot##faggot` in the custom box.  I don't think they ban you for fucking with the name field anymore.
